conversation.thought:
As Seeker_B, my goal is to secure a match with my highest preferred company. My preference list starts with Company_A (Rank 1). In the first round, the optimal strategy, following the proposing side of the Gale-Shapley algorithm, is to propose to my top choice.

My Top Choice: Company_A.

Assessing Competition:
Company_A ranks me (Seeker_B) 2nd, right after Seeker_A (1st).
Seeker_A's top choice is Company_B. It is highly likely that Seeker_A will propose to Company_B in Round 1.

Therefore, I will formally apply to Company_A immediately.
